current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for extensions of detention of certain
			 aliens ordered removed, and for other purposes.

text.#text:
If
		any of the provisions of this Act, any amendment made by this Act, or
		the application of any such provision to any person or circumstance, is held to
		be invalid for any reason, the remainder of this Act, the amendments made
		by this Act, and the application of the provisions and amendments made by
		this Act to any other person or circumstance shall not be affected by such
		holding.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall
		take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act.
